sentences.sContent: Historically, the consensus was to rigidly guard all source code and strictly govern how it was managed.
sentences.sContent_eng: Historically, the consensus was to rigidly guard all source code and strictly govern how it was managed.
sentences.sCn: 历史上，共识都将严格地保护所有的源代码，并严谨地支配它如何被管理。

synos.tran: 严格地；坚硬地；严厉地；牢牢地

words.tran: 严格的；僵硬的，死板的；坚硬的；精确的
严格的，严厉的；严密的；严酷的
[物] 硬度，[力] 刚性；严格，刻板；僵化；坚硬
